metadata.title: The impact of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) program on radiation and tissue banking in Indonesia

abstract.original_text: In 1986, the National Nuclear Energy Agency (Batan) in Jakarta started the research and development for the setting up of a tissue bank (Batan Research Tissue Bank/BRTB) by preserving fresh amnion or fetal membranes by lyophilisation and then sterilising by gamma irradiation. During

sentences.segment_text: In 1986 , the National Nuclear Energy Agency ( Batan ) in Jakarta started the research and development for the setting up of a tissue bank ( Batan Research Tissue Bank/BRTB ) by preserving fresh amnion or fetal membranes by lyophilisation and then sterilising by gamma irradiation .
